name: Fragment of Harmonic Whimsy
four_pc: When the value of a Bond of Life increases or decreases, this character deals 18% increased DMG for 6s. Max 3 stacks.

goblet.name: Ichor Shower Rhapsody
goblet.description: A rhyton fired with copper as the base, that was once filled with fine wine from paradise.

plume.name: Ancient Sea's Nocturnal Musing
plume.description: A feather accessory carved in the shape of the wings of the golden bees of legend. They seem to flutter with the slightest breeze.

circlet.name: Whimsical Dance of the Withered
circlet.description: A mask once covered in gold leaf. Perhaps it is a relic from some ancient officer of the legions.

flower.name: Harmonious Symphony Prelude
flower.description: An honorary medal in the shape of a blooming flower. Adorned with blue stone and gold, it was once bestowed upon immortals.

sands.name: The Grand Jape of the Turning of Fate
sands.description: A timepiece made in imitation of the wheel of fate. It ceased turning long ago.
